title: No-Man - Discography and Extras (1993-2008) [mp3@VBR]
description:
No-Man are Tim Bowness and Steven Wilson (the latter best known as the leader of Porcupine Tree). 

No-Man combine traditional values of songcraft and emotional commitment with an ongoing desire to play with the creative possibilities of modern music. Bridging the gaps between art-rock, electronica, experimental pop, jazz and contemporary classical music, the band has released six studio albums and lots of hard-to-find EP&#039;s.

Lovesighs - An Entertainment (1992) (mini album)
Loveblows & Lovecries - A Confession (1993)
Taking It Like a Man (1994) EP
Flowermouth (1994)
Flowermix (1995)
Heaven Taste (1995)
Wild Opera (1996)
Housewives Hooked On Heroin (1996) EP
Dry Cleaning Ray (1997) EP
Carolina Skeletons (1998) EP
Radio Sessions: 92-96 (1998)
((Speak)) (1999)
Lost Songs Vol - 1 (2001)
Returning Jesus (2001)
All That You Are (2003) EP
Together We&#039;re Stranger (2003)
All The Blue Changes - An Anthology 1988-2003 (2006)
Schoolyard Ghosts (2008) alternates/edits

Extras
